props.name: Max
props.description: The maximum value of the progress bar.

props.name: Current
props.description: The current value of the progress bar.

props.name: Icon
props.description: Optional icon to display in the progress bar.

props.name: Title
props.description: Optional title to display alongside the progress bar.

props.name: Subtitle
props.description: Optional subtitle to display below the progress bar.

props.name: Percentage
props.description: Optional flag to display percentage instead of absolute values.

props.name: OnClick
props.description: Action to perform when the progress bar is clicked.

props.name: HasLayout
props.description: Optional flag to enable layout styling.
